Passage 0: (Title: The Secret Life of Pets) The Secret Life of Pets The Secret Life of Pets is a 2016 American computer-animated adventure comedy buddy film produced by Illumination Entertainment. It is directed by Chris Renaud, co-directed by Yarrow Cheney and written by Brian Lynch, Cinco Paul and Ken Daurio. The film stars Louis C.K., Eric Stonestreet, Kevin Hart, Steve Coogan, Ellie Kemper, Bobby Moynihan, Lake Bell, Dana Carvey, Hannibal Buress, Jenny Slate, and Albert Brooks. Passage 1: (Title: The Secret Life of Pets 2) The Secret Life of Pets 2 The Secret Life of Pets 2 is an upcoming American 3D computer animated comedy film produced by Illumination. It is directed by Chris Renaud and written by Brian Lynch, and is a sequel to the 2016 film "The Secret Life of Pets". Most of the cast members will reprise their roles except for Louis C.K., who will be replaced by Patton Oswalt. Passage 0: (Title: Kirstjen Nielsen) Kirstjen Nielsen Kirstjen Michele Nielsen (born May 14, 1972) is an American attorney and national security expert serving since 2017 as the sixth and current United States Secretary of Homeland Security. Nielsen is a former Principal Deputy White House Chief of Staff to President Donald Trump, and was Chief of Staff to John F. Kelly during his term as Secretary of Homeland Security. She was confirmed on December 5, 2017, as the Secretary of Homeland Security. Following her appointment, Nielsen implemented a policy of separating parents and children accused of crossing over the U.S.–Mexico border illegally. Kirstjen Michele Nielsen was

forward:
Question: who does the voice of snowball in the secret life of pets
Information: The voice of Snowball in the movie "The Secret Life of Pets" is provided by Kevin Hart, an American comedian, actor, and producer. He brings to life the character Snowball, who is a white rabbit and the leader of a gang of abandoned pets known as "The Flushed Pets." Kevin Hart's energetic and comedic voice acting contributes significantly to the character's rebellious and humorous personality in the film. "The Secret Life of Pets" was released in 2016, and Kevin Hart reprised his role as Snowball in the sequel, "The Secret Life of Pets 2," which came out in 2019.

Question: Whose operas include one about each of the following; a king of Pontus, The Shepherd King, a king of Egypt and a king of Crete?
Information: The operas that include a king of Pontus, The Shepherd King, a king of Egypt, and a king of Crete are all composed by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart. The specific operas are:
"Mitridate, re di Ponto" (Mithridates, King of Pontus)
"Il re pastore" (The Shepherd King)
"Idomeneo, re di Creta" (Idomeneo, King of Crete)
The opera concerning a king of Egypt is not as directly named, but it could be a reference to "Die Zauberflöte" (The Magic Flute), which features a character named Tamino who becomes involved with the Queen of the Night and her daughter Pamina in a story with Egyptian themes. However, it should be noted that the character of the king of Egypt is not the central figure in this opera.
